p:
IIV split vaccines were produced in EB66 cells based on cH5/1 Cal09N1 Cal09 (cH5/1 IIV) and cH8/1 Cal09N1 Cal09 (cH8/1 IIV) viruses and were provided by GlaxoSmithKline.
38 The cH5/1 Cal09N1 Cal09virus expresses an HA head domain of A/Vietnam/1203/04 (H5N1), an H1 stalk domain and N1 NA from A/California/04/09 virus while the internal genes were derived from A/Puerto Rico/8/34 virus.
12, 32, 42 The cH8/1 Cal09N1 Cal09 expresses an HA head domain from A/mallard/Sweden/24/02 (H8N4) while the remaining genes as well as the stalk domain are the same as for the cH5/1 Cal09N1 Cal09 virus.
12, 32 The IIV vaccines were administered as non-adjuvanted (5 μg HA antigen in 500 μl of phosphate-buffered saline pH7.4 (PBS)) or adjuvanted with Adjuvant System 03 (AS03; 5 μg HA antigen in 0.25 mL of PBS plus 0.25 mL of AS03
43, 44 ).
